bwwExcerpt: Older theatre-goers may think they've stumbled onto a new revival of OH! CALCUTTA!, once the second act opening song "Hygge" kicks into gear. The film's trading post now includes a sauna and dancers clad in body stockings suggesting nudity, frolic about to choreographer Rob Ashford's giddy routine that has them quickly maneuvering towels and leaves to cover up the parts not sanctioned by Disney Theatrical Productions.
